attributes.action: Make national service compulsory for 18-20 year olds
attributes.additional_details:
Teach how to cook and clean
Teach how to manage finance
Teach adult life skills that full time education does not. 
It could also contribute to a healthy credit rating at a young age.
attributes.background: The youth of today lack discipline and respect. National service would help the youth to understand the importance of respecting others whilst learning important life skills.
